subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Even if Rafael Nadal loses at Roland Garros this year, he will still be the planet’s leading clay-court player, a force who has dominated the gritty red playgrounds of Europe.
snippet: Even if Rafael Nadal loses at Roland Garros this year, he will still be the planet’s leading clay-court player, a force who has dominated the gritty red playgrounds of Europe.
